entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
